code_files.context_snippet:
@mock.patch('os.write')
    def test_write(self, m_write):
        tr = self.write_pipe_transport()
        m_write.return_value = 4
        tr.write(b'data')
        m_write.assert_called_with(5, b'data')
        self.assertFalse(self.loop.writers)
        self.assertEqual([], tr._buffer)
